20#ifndef GCC_RESOURCE_H
21#define GCC_RESOURCE_H
22
23/* Macro to clear all resources. */
24#define CLEAR_RESOURCE(RES) \
25 do { (RES)->memory = (RES)->volatil = (RES)->cc = 0; \
26 CLEAR_HARD_REG_SET ((RES)->regs); } while (0)
27
28/* The resources used by a given insn. */
29struct resources
30{
31 char memory; /* Insn sets or needs a memory location. */
32 char volatil; /* Insn sets or needs a volatile memory loc. */
33 char cc; /* Insn sets or needs the condition codes. */
34 HARD_REG_SET regs; /* Which registers are set or needed. */
35};
36
37/* The kinds of rtl mark_*_resources will consider */
38enum mark_resource_type
39{
40 MARK_SRC_DEST = 0,
41 MARK_SRC_DEST_CALL = 1
42};
43
44extern void mark_target_live_regs (rtx_insn *, rtx, struct resources *);
45extern void mark_set_resources (rtx, struct resources *, int,
46 enum mark_resource_type);
47extern void mark_referenced_resources (rtx, struct resources *, bool);
48extern void clear_hashed_info_for_insn (rtx_insn *);
49extern void incr_ticks_for_insn (rtx_insn *);
50extern void mark_end_of_function_resources (rtx, bool);
51extern void init_resource_info (rtx_insn *);
52extern void free_resource_info (void);
53
54#endif /* GCC_RESOURCE_H */
55
